messages:
Name: Okan Buruk
Nationality: Turkey
Date of Birth: October 19, 1973
Position: 
Current club: İstanbul Başakşehir
Süper Lig clubs played for: Galatasaray, Beşiktaş, İstanbul Başakşehir
The last league match that Buruk played came on  for  versus ; a meeting that he played just zero minutes in during a .
A trip to Trabzonspor on October 18 is the club's next Süper Lig match for İstanbul Başakşehir, who have one point and are in 21st place.
Before moving to İstanbul Başakşehir in July 2008, Buruk made 206 league appearances in total at Galatasaray, scoring 35 goals.
